sentences.en: " Your humility, Mr. Bingley,'said Elizabeth, " must disarm reproof. "
sentences.cn: “ 彬格莱先生, ” 伊丽莎白说, “ 你这样谦虚, 真叫人家本来要责备你也不好意思责备了. ”

sentences.en: Are they sincere in their wish to disarm?
sentences.cn: 他们真的想裁军 吗 ?

sentences.en: Captured soldiers were disarmed and put into camps.
sentences.cn: 俘获的士兵被缴械后关进了战俘营。

sentences.en: Disarm: This ability now disarms ranged weapons as well.
sentences.cn: 缴械: 这个技能现在同时可以缴械对方的远程武器.

sentences.en: Getting the rebels to disarm will not be easy.
sentences.cn: 要让叛乱分子解除武装并非易事。

sentences.en: He crept up from behind and managed to disarm the man.
sentences.cn: 他从后面悄悄爬过来,缴了那人的械.

sentences.en: He has rejected every peaceful opportunity offered to him to disarm.
sentences.cn: 他已经拒绝了所有能和平缴械的机会.

sentences.en: It is difficult to persuade the Great Powers to disarm.
sentences.cn: 要说服列强裁军是很困难的.

sentences.en: It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.
sentences.cn: 要说服超级大国裁军是很难的.

sentences.en: It is difficult to persuade them to disarm.
sentences.cn: 要说服他们放下武器是很难的.

sentences.en: It is very difficult to persuade the imperislists to disarm.
sentences.cn: 说服帝国主义裁军是很难的.

sentences.en: Scorpid Sting - Attempts to Disarm the target for 10 sec.
sentences.cn: 毒蝎钉刺 - 尝试缴械目标10秒.

sentences.en: She did her best to disarm her critics.
sentences.cn: 她竭尽所能让批评她的那些人消气。

sentences.en: The superpowers are unlikely to disarm completely.
sentences.cn: 超级大国不太可能彻底裁军.

sentences.en: We'renot ready to disarm ourselves in order to make it easier for them to kill us.
sentences.cn: 我们可不准备放下武器，好让他们更轻易地干掉我们。

sentences.en: Which country will be the first to disarm?
sentences.cn: 哪一国将首先裁减军备?

sentences.en: You are endeavouring to disarm me by reason.
sentences.cn: 您正竭力寻找理由来否定我的想法.

words.tran_cn: 使解除警戒心的；使人消气的
解除武装；使息怒（disarm的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 缴…的械，解除武装，消除（某人）的怒气
trans.tran_en: to reduce the size of your army, navy etc, and the number of your weapons
to reduce the size of your army, navy etc, and the number of your weapons
